name: dfvd2imp
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wvd2(w0, w1, w2), wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)))

stmt.origin: biimpi(wvd2(w0, w1, w2), wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wvd2(w0, w1, w2), wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wvd2(w0, w1, w2), wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)))

comment: The virtual deduction form of a 2-antecedent nested implication implies the 2-antecedent nested implication. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 21-Apr-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
